__e: It took somebody who was kind to me getting killed to do it.
And you are very kind and thoughtful to come to me now when I need a friend.
You've been so very kind, and you... You ought to live and get married and bring up a family. You'd be very good at that.
The king is kind. And well we know the king knows at what time to promise, when to pay.
So I am asking you, I am begging you, Rachel, to please, please, just be kind... and don't take her away from me.
It's good to know that someone so many miles away can be so kind and generous to people they haven't even seen.
I didn't see his face but he's a good soul.
Will you be very kind and go tell the police that I'll do as they say?
And you go on and you live your life and you be good and you be kind and you be caring and loving and you see where in the hell it gets you.
